A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was really dissapointed with this movie. The pacing is very unbalanced. Major plot points are left with absolutely no explanation. Too much focus on cute critters that don't add anything to the story. Poor character development with a real sarcastic tone throughout. The whole thing seemed out of control and tied together with a bunch of star wars references\, never bringing anything unique to the franchise. An inauthentic parody. ?
